mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eml_tb( eml_sq, eml_nm, eml_cnt, eml_pl_nm, eml_pl_crs ) VALUES(SEQ_EML.NEXTVAL,#{eml_nm},#{eml_cnt},#{eml_pl_nm},#{eml_pl_crs})

INSERT INTO eml_rcv_tb( rcv_eml_sq, stf_snd_sq, eml_sq, ipt_sq, rcv_dt ) VALUES(SEQ_RCV_EML.NEXTVAL,#{stf_snd_sq}, (SELECT eml_sq from eml_tb where eml_sq = (SELECT MAX(eml_sq)AS eml_sq FROM eml_tb)),1,SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO eml_snd_tb( snd_eml_sq, stf_rcv_sq, eml_sq, snd_dt ) VALUES(SEQ_SND_EML.NEXTVAL,#{stf_rcv_sq}, (SELECT eml_sq from eml_tb where eml_sq = (SELECT MAX(eml_sq)AS eml_sq FROM eml_tb)),SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT eml_sq, eml_pl_nm, eml_nm, stf_nm, eml_cnt, rcv_dt FROM EML_RCV_VW WHERE eml_sq = #{eml_sq}
SELECT snd_eml_sq, eml_sq, eml_nm, eml_pl_nm, snd_dt, stf_nm, stf_snd_sq from eml_snd_vw where stf_snd_sq=#{stf_snd_sq}

select eml_sq, eml_nm, stf_nm, rcv_dt, stf_rcv_sq
from eml_rcv_vw where stf_rcv_sq=#{stf_rcv_sq}

select eml_sq, eml_nm, stf_nm, rcv_dt, stf_rcv_sq, ipt_sq
from eml_rcv_vw where stf_rcv_sq=#{stf_rcv_sq} AND ipt_sq= 2
